hr.fer.zemris.bool.fimpl

Class IndexedBF

  • java.lang.Object
    • hr.fer.zemris.bool.fimpl.IndexedBF
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BooleanFunction, BooleanSource, NamedBooleanSource

    public class IndexedBF
extends java.lang.Object
implements BooleanFunction
    Implementation of user specific boolean function in which user submits indexes wanted boolean variable results.
    Author:
    Igor Petkovski
